title: LATIN WORDS
content:
Apparently a lot of typophiles have an affinity for words so....   
clearing some links outta the attic. Ran across this page, a compendium of some of the most common Latin phrases used in English.   
   
   
 [http://depthome.brooklyn.cuny.edu/classics/englatin.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518052028/http:/depthome.brooklyn.cuny.edu/classics/englatin.htm)
author: bjharvey

comments.content:
So you're giving us your junk, eh? ;-)   
Nice link, thanks.
